From within the folder to commit, run the follwowing commands
[Source on Githelp](https://help.github.com/articles/adding-an-existing-project-to-github-using-the-command-line/)

```
git init
git add .
git commit -m 'First commit'
git remote add origin https://github.com/annlia/featureNEM
git remote -v
git push origin master
```
